pull.title: [trivial] Move blocksonly parameter interaction to InitParameterInteraction()
pull.body: Caused by a rebase conflict in #6780.

events.message: Move blocksonly parameter interaction to InitParameterInteraction()

events.body: This seems to be missing something :)
@pstratem Indeed, this should be squashed into df661476133364956a188f892de97974e69f8d6c. But this is already merged so I guess there is nothing I could do about that.

issue.title: Add -blocksonly option
issue.body:
Cherry-picked from the following upstream PRs:

- bitcoin/bitcoin#6993
- bitcoin/bitcoin#7046
- bitcoin/bitcoin#6780
  - The third commit (we backported the rest in #2390).
- bitcoin/bitcoin#7126
- bitcoin/bitcoin#7439
- bitcoin/bitcoin#15990
  - Only the `-blocksonly` documentation changes.
- bitcoin/bitcoin#16555
- bitcoin/bitcoin#18391
  - Only the `-blocksonly` documentation changes.

Part of #2074.
